attributes.action: Investigate and untimately ban the sexist practice of cheaper "Ladies only" car insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If insurance companies were to offer "specific religion" insurance policies there would be an outcry and a possible police investigation. The cost of car insurance should be standard across the board, as it is with petrol and Road Fund license. This is sexism at it's worst.
